meta.content: Our Motto - Excellence, Pride, Success... For Every Student! The mission of Enid Public Schools is to promote life-long learning through educational excellence.

School Board Filing Period Through December 4
Those interested in serving on the Enid Board of Education are encouraged to apply with the Garfield County Election Board. Filings are being accepted . . .

The honorees, selected by their colleagues, now will be . . .

EPS Principal Nominated for National Award
Scott Allen, Monroe Elementary principal, has been nominated for LifeChanger of the Year. He was nominated by a colleague and a Monroe . . .

div.h4: Enid School Board Welcomes New Member Posted Date: 12/06/2019
div.p:
Enid School Board Welcomes New Member
Enid Board of Education members welcomed a new board member at Monday night’s meeting: Christopher Gerber, who will represent Office 3.

div.h4: EPS Launches New Teacher Award Posted Date: 10/01/2019
Carver Earns Model School Status Posted Date: 09/09/2019
div.p:
EPS School Earns New Status
Enid Public Schools Carver Early Childhood Center is celebrating being named an Oklahoma A+ Demonstration School.
The honor will be presented by the Oklahoma A+ Schools . . .
